Dialog.name: Quest1/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: I'm back. Did someone try to kill me?
And this place... it looks familiar to me.
I have an armor... mine?
You're Sigmus! Our great General! Where have you been? Don't you remember us?
Damn you, liar demon. Die!

Dialog.name: Quest1/AfterFirstWave
Dialog.Message: Why is this feeling so familiar...?

Dialog.name: Quest2/Start
Dialog.Message: Sigmus please! Help me! I'm injured!
Do you know me? Do you know anything? Tell me!
What?!
If you save me I'll tell you everything I know.
Ok then, start talking...
I need 10 laurelius leaves from the Graveyard to cure myself.
But first you'll have to kill the monsters who guard them.

Dialog.name: Quest2/End
Dialog.Message: Thanks, you've saved me.

Dialog.name: Quest3/Start
Dialog.Message: OK Sigmus, while I cure my injuries... Do you remember Aurora?
Aurora? She is... my lover. Where is she?
She sacrificed her soul to release yours. She used the Diamond Soul's Dagger.
She's alive? Tell me where she is!
If you came back to life, You probably made an arrangement to rescue her.
If the legend is true you must destroy the dagger and release her soul.
Then... give it to me!
I can't. An ally of Demonic Lord came and took the dagger and her body.
You should go and look for it in the Graveyard!

Dialog.name: Quest3/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: What are you doing here?! You are our leader!
I'm nobody's leader. Give me back the Diamond Soul and Aurora!
I always knew that a poor human like you could never be a true leader.

Dialog.name: Quest3/AfterDefeatBigReaper
Dialog.Message: Now give me the dagger!
Haha, it's too late. Our Lord already has the Diamond Soul and also Aurora's body.

Dialog.name: Quest4/Start
Dialog.Message: I couldn't rescue her...
Don't worry, soon you will have a second chance...
Father Thiltran! My informants saw Demonic Lord in the north sector of the Sanctuary Town.
Also, who's your new friend?
Sigmus, she is the General of the ally forces.
And with her you can have your biggest oportunity!
Yes Father.

Dialog.name: Quest4/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: You... my right hand, my greatest warrior. A traitor! And just for that foolishness called love. You’re despicable.
Who are you? Do you know me?
I see. Those old men erased your memory, but not your essence. You fought by my side, for a great cause.
Now you're fighting for a woman's body. What an insignificant thing... I gave you all your power!
I turned you into the greatest warrior!
Now come, and defeat me!... If you can. Traitor.
You're talking too much.

Dialog.name: Quest4/AfterDefeatingDemonicLord
Dialog.Message: And you call this a fight? You’re not even the seed of the oak you used to be.
The Light Warriors have left you as a weak farmer.

Dialog.name: Quest5/Start
Dialog.Message: I couldn't rescue her... and his words... I don't understand what's going on.
Sigmus, you were the darkest warrior of Demonic Lord, sending darkness everywhere.
All because Demonic Lord cast a spell on you...
...so you will live as long as your rage exists.
I see you're still a great warrior and now you fight against your old master.
I want you in my army.
Ok... for Aurora.
Let's start right now.
We have to bring some herbs to Father Thiltran to make more potions for our warriors.

Dialog.name: Quest5/End
Dialog.Message: Here you have your materials...
Thanks. Please take the potions and take them to Oblivion’s Forest.

Dialog.name: Quest6/Start
Dialog.Message: Queen Nessa Faelivrin, here you have your potions.
Give my gratitude to Thiltran...
So you are our new warrior... I heard you've lost your memories, but let me remind you something.
You killed my King. So don't expect that I'll trust you.
The only reason keeping you alive in my lands is Thiltran. He gave me his word about you and your abilities.
Those were other times, I was different... Now my only wish is to defeat Demonic Lord.
Prove it.
Go and release my royal guard from the demons.

Dialog.name: Quest6/SelfThought
Dialog.Message: There is something in the shadows... Am I really doing the right thing?

Dialog.name: Quest6/RescueElf
Dialog.Message: You're Sigmus the Heartless. Will you be my killer?
Just run and escape... while you can.

Dialog.name: Quest7/Start
Dialog.Message: Good work warrior.
Oh... Kathia! What happened?
My Queen! We were fighting for three days against a werewolf in the woods!
We couldn't beat it!
Sigmus, it's time to prove your loyalty.
Go and defeat the werewolf, and you'll show us that you're on our side.
I'll do it. But not for you. I'll do it for my real mission.

Dialog.name: Quest7/WerewolfDialog
Dialog.Message: Bastard! Don't you remember that you guided me to the battle? That we fought together?!
I don't remember having fought beside a nasty lapdog.
So, it's true...
Don't you remember that you taught me to fight and use magic?
Don't you remember that you taught me to appreciate the taste of the blood?!
Together we found Aurora, after killing her entire family!
Shut your stinking muzzle! You liar!
You have changed... now I'll be stronger by tasting your blood.
You could never be stronger.

Dialog.name: Quest7/AfterDefeatingWerewolf
Dialog.Message: You're even capable to end with me... Aurora truly damaged you.
Why did you say that?! Answer the question!
Aaaarghh!!!!

Dialog.name: Quest8/Start
Dialog.Message: You surprised me Sigmus, maybe Thirtran is right about you.
And speaking about Thiltran, I need you to give these to him, to make an antidote for our warriors.
We've heard that one of the Five Dark Generals is near.
Dark Generals?
Yes, the elite of Demonic Lord's army, trained by him...
...and you.
Damn it! So much that I can't remember... Ok, give me the herbs.
Be careful, the Dark Generals are not the only menace in your way.

Dialog.name: Quest9/Start
Dialog.Message: Oh! You're still alive.
Thank you for the herbs. I'll do the antidote immediately. And how is you mission?
I'm confused, it looks like I've done terrible things, even to Aurora's family.
Aurora erased your dark past with her sacrifice, and that's why you have a new hope. A new life!
Your fight is a new chance to battle for the light.
The light... the darkness... it's all the same crap.
Just tell me who those five Dark Generals are.
One of them is near.
The Green Darkness; this antidote is to fight against her poison.
She's at Oblivion's Forest, go quickly.

Dialog.name: Quest9/GreenDarknessDialog
Dialog.Message: We bump into each other again, Sigmus the Traitor. When I heard I couldn't believe it.
You, who escaped with this elf, Aurora...
Don't say her name!
You know I was always a better warrior than she was... in everything.
Or have you forgotten the years we were together? Why didn't you choose me?
And I even trained her to fight, for you... for love. But it really seems that you've lost your memories.
Do you really believe that she's an angel? You taught her to kill! She's murderer because of you!
She's not better than us.
And Demonic Lord is very disappointed...
I'm really going to enjoy this! I'll enjoy smashing you into pieces!

Dialog.name: Quest9/AfterDefeatingGreenDarkness
Dialog.Message: Damn you traitor, I should suppose it.
Tell me where I can find Demonic Lord!
Even in my last moments you demand things of me...
I really loved you, but you never loved me back.
He is in his castle, but the Diamond Soul is guarded by the Kraken.
You know how he loooks like. Please be careful, my love...

Dialog.name: Quest10/Start
Dialog.Message: I already defeated Green Darkness. Anyway, here's your antidote.
I don't care if you trust me. I always carry out my promises.
I believe in you Sigmus...
Our army is surrounded in the beach! My second-in-command is there!

Dialog.name: Quest10/End
Dialog.Message: Kathia, I need to know where the Kraken is.
He is on Stone Man's Island. Why do you want to know that?
Because he has the Diamond Soul Dagger.
How did you know it?
A dear friend told me...

Dialog.name: Quest11/Start
Dialog.Message: I can't believe that you're here, Sigmus.
Sigmus the Destructor, and now the Savior...
How ironic.
Without the Queen's request, you couldn't put a foot on my Island.
Do you remember what you did here?
Everyone ask me the same thing... and I can't remember anything.
This is Aurora's homeland. She's my niece.
You murdered my sister, pretending to hurt my leadership.
Those were other times. Now both of us want Aurora back.
We'll see that...
I have troubles in the south side of the Island, and I would like to see it clean.
I heard that you're looking for the Kraken. If you do what I'm asking for I'll tell you where it is.

Dialog.name: Quest12/Start
Dialog.Message: Sigmus! The pirates have taken my wife and my only heir! Rescue them!
If you do it I'll tell you some important information about Aurora.
Tell me now!
No, first rescue them...

Dialog.name: Quest12/AfterKillingPirate
Dialog.Message: You're late.
Our boss already killed Hotu's wife, and kidnapped his son to offer him to Demonic Lord.
You'll never catch him! Hahaha!

Dialog.name: Quest13/Start
Dialog.Message: I'm sorry. It's too late for your wife, but your son has been captured by the pirate Blood Steel.
I'll rescue him, but then you have to tell me where the Kraken is.
I give you my word. Just rescue my son...

Dialog.name: Quest13/BloodSteelDialog
Dialog.Message: Haha, you're late for the woman, and maybe also for the kid.
Do you know that he's Aurora's cousin?
I heard you were the best of all... But that title will be mine when I kill you!
Huge words for someone so insignificant.

Dialog.name: Quest13/AfterDefeatingBloodSteel
Dialog.Message: You'll be surprised to know how different Aurora is now... It was a real pleasure bringing her to Demonic Lord.
Hahaha, you have to ask him how did he turn her into something so delicious.

Dialog.name: Quest14/Start
Dialog.Message: Thank you for saving my son!
We know where the Kraken is, but he is with a huge army.
Looks like they're guarding something... something important
Yes, my beloved one's salvation...
To reach the Kraken's lair, you have to open three gates.
And to open them you must destroy their black magic totems, that are on the East, West and North of the island.

Dialog.name: Quest14/AfterDestroyingTotem
Dialog.Message: I'm getting closer.

Dialog.name: Quest15/Start
Dialog.Message: Good! The second totem is on the West area. Be careful.

Dialog.name: Quest15/AfterDestroyingTotem
Dialog.Message: Soon the Diamond Soul Dagger will be in my hands.

Dialog.name: Quest16/Start
Dialog.Message: You only need one more. It's in the North. Good Luck!

Dialog.name: Quest16/AfterDestroyingTotem
Dialog.Message: Ok I destroyed all the totems. Kraken... be prepared.

Dialog.name: Quest17/Start
Dialog.Message: That was the last one. You're ready to face the Kraken.
But be careful with the dark powers, they could be tempting.

Dialog.name: Quest17/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: Sigmus, my child, my disciple... ¿Do you remember?
Disciple? Damn octopus...
I taught you to fight. Demonic Lord himself gave me that mission.
In fact, it was me who separated you from your family.
Damn you, Sigmus, Demonic Lord raised you like a son...
Someone who is born in light always belongs to it. I told him a thousand times!
But Demonic Lord always believed that you would be a great general...
It doesn't matter that you were born in the Light Warriors' House.
You're mumbling nonsenses... I just want the dagger.
Hahaha! This one? If you can remember my lessons maybe you can have it.

Dialog.name: Quest17/AfterDefeatingFirstTentacles
Dialog.Message: Not so fast! this is just the beginning...

Dialog.name: Quest17/AfterDefeatingKraken
Dialog.Message: Damn you and your descendants, Sigmus... I taught you well... maybe too much.
Here's your dagger, but you'll be surprised to know what my Master does with your woman.
Liar!
Get prepared for a big surprise! Hahaha!

Dialog.name: Quest18/Start
Dialog.Message: I see you have the dagger. Now what?
I have to find Aurora... do you know anything?
No, but maybe my son knows something...
I only heard that on the West side of the Island there were warriors talking about her...
They said that she's not the same anymore.
Maybe you can go there and find out something else.

Dialog.name: Quest18/AfterDefeatingImp
Dialog.Message: Damn you demons, you know something about Aurora! Tell me!
Please don't kill me, I'll tell you everything I know, but please don't hurt me.
OK, pest, tell me.
She's on Volcano Higlands! Nooo! Arghh!

Dialog.name: Quest19/Start
Dialog.Message: I know where Aurora is. She's trapped in Volcano Higlands.
Then you'll have to increase your power.
No one can access that city directly. To get into it you have to go back to Oblivion's Forest.
Queen Nessa put a barrier between both cities.
Only with her spell you can cross over to Volcano Higlands.
Be careful, lately the forest has been under continuous magma demons attacks.
And you'll probably encounter them.

Dialog.name: Quest20/Start
Dialog.Message: You're back, Sigmus. Have you progressed in your crusade?
Yes. I have the dagger, but my loved one's body is at Volcano Highlands.
I see. I blocked the pass to that city with a strong spell.
To open it I'll need some magic zapphires. You can find them at the forest's borders, in the Northern area.
You must be careful... the place is under the attack of fire demons.
OK, I'll go for the stones.

Dialog.name: Quest21/Start
Dialog.Message: Queen Nessa, I found the zapphires, now you can start with the ritual.
Very good Sigmus. With this zapphires and using my energy, I've covered you with a special aura that will allow you to cross over.
Be careful with the city's guardian, at the other side of the frontier.
And once inside, trust no one. Darkness owns the place. Be careful.

Dialog.name: Quest21/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: Sigmus, is it true that you've changed? We are friends... do you remember me?
Golem? My faithful Golem? Of course I remember you! I don't want to fight against you.
Sigmus! I knew you were still alive! Please stay away from me.
I'm under a witchcraft of Magma Phoenix. It forces me to fight, even against you...
But there must be a solution... My faithful friend, you saved me so many times, this time i'll try to save you.

Dialog.name: Quest21/AfterDefeatingLavaGolem
Dialog.Message: You defeated me Sigmus. Kill me now!
No my friend. Take this rune from Queen Nessa Faelivrin.
Once you pass the barrier, tell that you're my friend and they will protect you. No other dark creature will be able to cross over.
Thanks my friend. Before crossing let me tell you that Aurora isn't here.
But the city contains the gate to cross to the Lord's lands.
Just be very cautious, because to arrive there you'll have to defeat Magma Phoenix...
...and in the past you never could win her.
Yes, but now I'm stronger. My energy comes from other feelings.

Dialog.name: Quest22/Start
Dialog.Message: Please get closer... you're just like an old friend.
I think you're confusing me with somebody else...
It's true, you look like a great warrior, his name was Sigmus.
I'm Sigmus!
You're not the Sigmus that i knew.
He was the best Light Warrior, a skilled swordsman and unbeatable in the uses of magic.
But everything changed when Demonic Lord kidnapped his pregnant wife.
Well, those were other times... now, i see in your energy that you're the person that i was waiting for.
You are Queen Nessa's envoy.
Yes. I'm looking for the gate to the Land of the Fallen Angels.
First you have to go to the volcano caves and get five crystals from the fire imps.
It will allow me to open the dark barrier over the portal.

Dialog.name: Quest22/SelfThought
Dialog.Message: So bizarre. The story fits with how Demonic Lord made me his warrior.

Dialog.name: Quest23/Start
Dialog.Message: Here are your crystals, now help me. But first...
...to which caste did your friend belong? When was that?
Sigmus belongs to the purest caste of all... the Light Warriors. 400 years ago.
But it's impossible, you cannot be alive!
I'm one of the last members of the caste of the Light Warriors. We have the power to live forever.
The hope gives us the energy.
Now, Sigmus, go and defeat the frontier guardians to cross over it and defeat Magma Phoenix.

Dialog.name: Quest24/Start
Dialog.Message: You fought like a true warrior, you remind me of my best friend.
I can even see him in your eyes...
Maybe the stories were true and Demonic Lord transformed you into his warrior.
But not anymore. Now I'm fighting for my beloved one, who sacrificed herself to clean my soul.
Your father will be proud, you fight with his courage.
I'll give you something important to us. Take this crystal.
A crystal?
This is the Crystal of the Light Keepers. It allows you to communicate with every Light Warrior alive.
I thought that you were the last one...
Things aren't always what they seem, Sigmus...
Think about Father Thiltran... he's an old comrade-in-arms of your father and mine.
Thiltran! But how... when...
Sigmus! I see you're still alive.
And I see you're talking with this crazy man who no one could kill before.
Be careful with this woman, Sigmus...
Shut up, looney!!!
Arggghhhh!!
Why did you kill him?!
He's the only one that could tell me about my origins!
Sigmus... have you really lost your memory? Don't you remember me?
I'll be waiting for you at the other side of the barrier that you destroyed.
Come back here, damn girl!

Dialog.name: Quest24/MagmaPhoenixDialog
Dialog.Message: You're Magma Phoenix?! But you're the General of the resistance!
I'm also the Captain of the Demonic Lord's army, after your betrayal.
What a bad memory you have...
But... why?
Don't you think it's the best plan ever? The resistance couldn't win a battle for more than a hundred years!
Do you imagine why?
Because I guided them, Sigmus!

Dialog.name: Quest24/AfterDefeatingMagmaPhoenix
Dialog.Message: But how could you defeat me!
Because I'm a Light Warrior now, and hope make us stronger!
Now I know who I am, everything was a lie. Demonic Lord didn't give me the immortality.
The purest caste of Light Warriors, where I belong, is eternal. He just kidnapped me.
Hope? When you find your beloved one, we'll see if you still have hopes...

Dialog.name: Quest25/Start
Dialog.Message: You did it!
But how... I saw you die!
Almost, but remember that hope gives us the strength and keep us alive.
Seeing you has renewed my hopes.
Your father will be proud, you're the last active Light Warrior.
Thank you.
You can cross the portal, but be careful, this is only the beginning. Those lands are full of black warriors.

Dialog.name: Quest25/SelfThought
Dialog.Message: My love, I'm getting closer. My anger has turned into hope...

Dialog.name: Quest26/Start
Dialog.Message: Sigmus... I see that my suppositions were true.
Thiltran, why didn't you tell me about my real father...
I wasn't sure, it was many years ago...
But now I am! You're a true Light Warrior!
The gods accepted your title and sent you back from the dead.
And Aurora's sacrifice...
That was the purification that you needed to face that stage.
Now, keep going, but be careful. The last fights are nothing compared with the ones that will come.

Dialog.name: Quest26/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: Damn it Demon, you're really huge. But i'm gonna defeat you just like the others!
Where is Demonic Lord?!
Where is Aurora?! Tell me!
You're just an abomination...

Dialog.name: Quest26/AfterDefeatingExecutioner
Dialog.Message: Show me where Demonic Lord is!
Nooo, nooo light, just darkness... Aaarghh!
You were nothing more than a guard dog...

Dialog.name: Quest27/Start
Dialog.Message: Master, there's only darkness here. I don't know where I have to go. Have you been here before?
I just heard rumours, but...
People says that you always have to follow the darkest path.
But be careful, nobody knows how many abominations you can find.
Wait, I've been here before... I'm starting to remember. I took this road many times before.
Be careful, my son. Remember that there it is the Great Impaler.
People say that he's even stronger than Demonic Lord.
I know where I have to go now...

Dialog.name: Quest28/Start
Dialog.Message: Master... I remember everything.
I know where the Impaler is... he's a terrific warrior.
People say that he was the stronger Light Warrior.
Even your father, trying to rescue you, went to fight against Demonic Lord and was defeated by the Impaler.
Then, I'm not only avenging my beloved one, I will also seek revenge for my family.
That's right, my son. From now on we can't communicate anymore... be careful.

Dialog.name: Quest28/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: For many years no one could get here.
For centuries no one wanted to fight against me.
Everyone who tried, is dead now.
Who are you to challenge me now?
I'm Sigmus. I've never been here before, this part of the city was forbidden to me.
Sigmus? My Sigmus? It's impossible, he's dead.
He was my son, and he was killed by Demonic Lord.
Looking for him I lost all hope, I even defeated the old Impaler.
But Demonic Lord took my anger and transformed me into...
...this. A creature of death. That's why I'll kill you, for pretending to be my son!

Dialog.name: Quest28/AfterDefeatingImpaler
Dialog.Message: Listen to me... I'm Sigmus, the last Light Warrior.
You're still a great warrior, but instead of you I never lost my hope.
Sigmus? Is it really you?
Forgive me, I'm ashamed of myself. Look what I've become.
Please end with this body. I'm already dead. This is only flesh and dark magic.
Father, I'll take care of releasing you... and the world will know that you were a great Light Warrior.
I will never give up.
Now just... rest in peace.
Thank you... Son.

Dialog.name: Quest29/Start
Dialog.Message: I defeated the Impaler.
Demonic Lord used the last energy and strength of a great Light Warrior.
He used him for his dark purposes.
Just because the warrior lost his hope.
So, he really was a Light Warrior. Do you know who was he?
I didn't know him. But in the end he acted like a great person.
So... What will you do now?
I'm getting into the castle.
Good luck! You must have faith and courage, my son.

Dialog.name: Quest30/Start
Dialog.Message: Sigmus, if you feel strong enough to face Demonic Lord, I'll give you my blessing for this fight.
Don't fall for his tricks, as he'll try to trick you back to his side.
Also, remember you're one of the greatest Light Warrior. You have hope in your heart.
Thanks Father, I will not forget. I must not forget!
Go ahead then, and rescue your wife. Good luck in this last fight.

Dialog.name: Quest30/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: Sigmus! How dare you come here...
Aurora!
My love, I came here to rescue you!
I don't need to be rescued, my lover already did.
Demonic Lord took my soul and gave me a new reason...
Now the taste of blood guides me. You were just a little sample of his power!
Now I see it... he's my real love, my master. I wasted my time with you.
Aurora, if your soul still resists inside, please...
...tell me something. Tell me that you're still alive, and I'll have the courage to fight for you.
Sigmus... I don't know what happened to me... help me... I'm changing. We have no time!
Please defeat me and vanquish that Demonic Lord!
...What? What am I saying? Damn you, you're confusing me! Let's fight!
For your soul...

Dialog.name: Quest30/AfterDefeatingAurora
Dialog.Message: Now it's my chance... I'll use the dagger!
Damn you, you defeated me! No! What are you doing?! Drop the dagger! No!
Arghhh!!!

Dialog.name: Quest31/BeginCinematic
Dialog.Message: Ha! Everyone believes that this dagger would release her soul. The truth is...
...you're just killing her! Hahahaha!
The dagger is only for the Light Warrior's transformation ritual.
It doesn't work on other races.
I'm afraid you're killing your wife, Sigmus.
With your own hands!
You did all of this!
Of course I did!
I dressed up one of my slaves and made the story arrive to Aurora.
You're just one of my puppets in this world.
Swine!
Sigmus! Oh, I see... I can see across the crystal that everything was a lie.
Oh, Wait! Here is someone who wants to talk to you.
Son, get focused, don't fall into Demonic Lord's game.
It's true that you've been deceived...
...but this is your chance to turn yourself into a true Light Warrior.
What are you talking about, father?!
You're the only one who really knows about Demonic Lord. Use your anger as energy.
Look inside. Aurora's soul is still here, feel it. Calm down.
Shut up! You weren't even good enough as my guardian!
Stop talking nonsenses!
Wait, you're right. I actually feel an energy around Aurora... I have a chance.
Demonic Lord, I'll destroy you!
I won't let this happen again!
Insolent pupil! Do you want to try again? Hahaha!

Dialog.name: Quest31/BeginDemonicLordTransformation
Dialog.Message: Hahaha, that was just my first level. Just a small part of my strength.

Dialog.name: Quest31/EndDemonicLordTransformation
Dialog.Message: This is my real power! You're just a light worm! Taste my real force!
You're just talking from fear.
You're afraid of me because I'm taking with me all the Light Warriors' power.
And the hope of my beloved one's soul!
Die!

Dialog.name: Quest31/DemonicLordDeathDialog
Dialog.Message: Hahaha, by killing me you just saved your lover's soul.
But with all my power, I'm just the third soul of my master.
And there is no Light warrior or darkest one who can defeat his second soul or him.
You're only an ant in his world. Take the elven soul...
...it will be useless in her destroyed body!!!
Hahaha! Arggghhh!

Dialog.name: Quest31/AuroraHealingDialog
Dialog.Message: Auroraaaaa!

Dialog.name: QuestEasterEgg/Start
Dialog.Message: Okay, okay, you discovered me.
I heard that near this village, a fellow soldier from Nano Kingdoms was trapped by monsters.
Will you help him?

Messages.Message: Some creatures from the cemetery robbed my store the other day!
Please, help me Sigmus!
I need some Eye Ghost slime to prepare my healing potions.
Can you fill this pot with the slime, please?
I heard the ghosts stole the runes that protect the Forest.
Could you recover them to me? I'll send them to Queen Nessa.
The bats by the cemetery frightened a young girl.
I'm too old to get her back,
I need some plants seeds to reforest the eastern plains.
Mind getting me some, please?
Caterpillars love to hide emeralds near their nests.
I need them to infuse my magic on these armors.
I need some Lycan's Blood to cure our injured warriors.
Can you kill like, 10 werewolves, and bring me their blood?
One of my soldiers went to the forest to spy on our enemies.
He hasn't come back in three days.
I'm afraid he has been ambushed.
The ghosts are trying to sink this town under the ocean tides!
Please recover the water runes!
Sigmus! Thieves robbed my sacred moonstones!
I'm supposed to engrave these shields with them!
An elder came from the volcano town.
He said the sea creatures stole their Fire Runes.
I went to the volcano to get some supplies and the fire skulls attacked me.
Can you help me recover my valuable sunstones?
And, while there, can you get some imp wings?
One of the ingredients of my potions is honey.
Maybe I'll tell you which if you help me. Or not.
The Horns of the red knights helmets are an expensive luxury.
Some men are willing to pay a lot for swords with these.

MetaQuest.name: Town4/HostageQuest
MetaQuest.title: The Old Man and the Lava

Messages.Message: The town's philosopher went to the volcano's cliff to think yesterday.
I don't know what happened, but I think he was attacked.
Maybe you can help him get back to the town?
One of my rings is heavily infused in a pot filled with wisps.
You can find them following the warlocks.
I'm too old to get Beholder's Eyes for my armors...
Can you help me? I'll reward you.
My swords! I'm under a sleep curse! Please help me!
The robbers got my swords while I was sleeping!
